title: How Her Ancestors Reignited Her Return to Theater
description: Quiara Alegría Hudes is back with a new work, an Off Broadway production of “My Broken Language,” adapted from her 2021 memoir.
dc:creator: Jose Solís
media:credit: Molly Matalon for The New York Times
media:description: Quiara Alegría Hudes on the set of her new play, “My Broken Language,” at Signature Theater in Manhattan.
